article_title: Marin’s top health officer tackles top issues in Q&A
article_text:
Novato, CA (94945)

Today

A mainly sunny sky. High 77F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph..

Tonight

A mostly clear sky. Low around 50F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

og.description: In a recent appearance at Smith Ranch Homes in San Rafael, Marin County Health Officer Matt Willis addressed a recent gathering in Marin County and why it has been judged
